title: Large Cavern
description: You stand in a large cavern cluttered with stalagmites and stalagtites that divide the room into many smaller chambers and passages and limit vision in any direction to a few feet. The maze-like form of this cavern is somewhat unnerving, as if someone or something had used natural forces to create a very unnatural labyrinth. You have entered the lair of the minotaur. The only exits are to the north and through an iron bound oak door to the southeast.

southeast.description: The iron bound oak door is locked tight.
